title: Citizens' Assembly Protocol
author: CivHub
summary: A randomly selected group of citizens is convened to deliberate on a policy issue and produce recommendations based on structured discussion and expert input.

title: Participatory Budgeting – Simple Tier
author: CivHub
summary: A civic process in which residents vote on how to allocate a portion of a public budget across community-proposed projects.

title: Public Testimony Flow
author: CivHub
summary: A structured process for collecting, managing, and surfacing public input on pending legislation in an accessible and transparent format.

title: Quadratic Voting
author: CivHub
summary: A voting system that allows participants to allocate votes to express the strength of their preferences, using quadratic cost scaling to prevent vote hoarding.
